title: Is destiny real or can we create it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Destiny are your present choices, thus you have some control over it . I can say that I am the architect of my destiny but God is the central Being that leads me there. Hence I have total control. “In the mortal life, paths of differential conduct are continually opening and closing, and during the times when choice is possible the human personality is constantly deciding between these many courses of action. Temporal volition is linked to time, and it must await the passing of time to find opportunity for expression. Spiritual volition has begun to taste liberation from the fetters of time, having achieved partial escape from time sequence, and that is because spiritual volition is self-identifying with the will of God.” UB
